alert.note: Alert for Cocke Smoky Mountains; Northwest Cocke; Northwest Greene; Southeast Greene; Unicoi (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 25 at 9:39PM CDT by NWS Knoxville
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT COCKE...SOUTHERN GREENE AND SOUTHWESTERN UNICOI COUNTIES THROUGH 1115 PM EDT... At 1038 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster of strong thunderstorms over Parrottsville, or 8 miles northeast of Newport, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Greeneville, Newport, Tusculum, Parrottsville, Mosheim, Caney Branch, Del Rio, Cedar Creek, Max Patch, and Bybee. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Persons in campgrounds should consider seeking sturdy shelter until this storm passes.

area.areaDesc: Cocke Smoky Mountains; Northwest Cocke; Northwest Greene; Southeast Greene; Unicoi
